text: Hi all, I'd love to write for blogs of B2B Saas companies. I have subject matter expertise in website management, content management systems (Wordpress, Sharepoint), digital marketing, email marketing (Mailchimp), web project management from a 16+ year career as a digital communications manager. My availability is a maximum of 2 posts per month at this time. Here is a link to my writing portfolio: <https://www.clippings.me/redante>. If there are Saas companies and agencies out there needing writers for their blogs in the above niches please DM me. Even if you don't have immediate work but would like to connect I'd love to do so. Thanks!
